tool_description: An API to get recent news on cryptocurrencies around the world
name: Crypto News
title: Crypto News

api_list.name: All Recent News
api_list.description: Returns all recent crypto news in JSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific News Source
api_list.description: Get all recent news from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com/news/dailycoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newsid}"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Articles
api_list.description: Search recent news articles for specific keywords
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com/news/search/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com/news/search/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
